value.title: How To Make Better Bricks For Better Homes In Nepal
value.excerpt: Engineers and entrepreneurs in Nepal are using a different kind of brick to rebuild the country using a process that produce less carbon and other air pollution.

value.title: 4 updates from the 2024 Google for Games Developer Summit
value.excerpt: These new tools help developers build immersive and engaging games that players love.

value.title: Science Offers A New Way To Save Birds From The Jaws Of Wind Turbines
value.excerpt: Many migratory birds die each year flying into the blades of our wind farms. Weather radar data is showing us how we can be nicer to our sky-fairing friends.

value.title: This Startup Says It Can Beat Deepmind’s Gamechanging Protein AI
value.excerpt: Basecamp Research says its software platform can better predict the way proteins behave — not with better algorithms, but with higher-quality data.

value.title: Manipulated Kate Middleton Photo Sparks Royal Frenzy Of Jokes And Memes
value.excerpt: After Kate apologizes for a Photoshopped family picture, the online masses can't resist poking fun at the latest controversy to hit Kensington Palace.

value.title: How to use Google Gemini, the main challenger to ChatGPT
value.excerpt: Gemini Advanced is Google’s paid chatbot version that costs $20 per month and comes with a host of perks under the Google One AI Premium subscription tier. Gemini Advanced runs the Gemini Ultra 1.0 language model, which excels at understanding longer prompts and the context of previous prompts.

value.title: State Dept-backed report provides action plan to avoid catastrophic AI risks
value.excerpt: While providing technical details on the risks of AI, the action plan also introduces policy proposals that can help the U.S. and its allies mitigate these risks.

value.title: DeepMind and Stanford’s new robot control model follow instructions from sketches

value.title: Google is breaking too many things in a rush to lead on AI

value.title: How AI is helping advance women’s health around the world
value.excerpt: For International Women’s day, we’re highlighting AI solutions that can improve early diagnosis, quality and access to care for women’s health worldwide.

value.title: Google Gemini's Latest Update Empowers Content Editing With AI; Here’s How You Can Do It

value.title: Google’s GenAI Bots Are Struggling. But So Are Its Humans

value.title: Google’s Genie game maker is what happens when AI watches 30K hrs of video games
value.excerpt: To establish that model, Genie started with 200,000 hours of public Internet gaming videos, which were filtered down to 30,000 hours of standardized video from "hundreds of 2D games." The individual frames from those videos were then tokenized into a 200-million-parameter model that a machine learning algorithm could easily work with.

value.title: There are growing calls for Google CEO Sundar Pichai to step down

value.title: Google CEO Pichai says Gemini's AI image results 'offended our users'
value.excerpt: Google CEO Sundar Pichai told employees in an internal memo that the AI tool’s problematic images were unacceptable. He vowed to re-release a better version of the service in the coming weeks.

value.title: Google Genie and the AIs set to revolutionize gaming
value.excerpt: DeepMind's Genie AI is a relatively small 11 billion-parameter model, trained on more than 200,000 hours of video of people playing 2D platformer-style games, without human supervision.
